company.name: Apiary.io
company.summary:
Apiary.io wants to make developing and implementing APIs a quicker process. Apiary.io site says they will also help you describe, test, manage and share your API with developers.
I feel that API deployment services is a huge opportunity in this space, its good to see a provider step up that will help API owners deploy their APIs, as well as manage them.

company.details:
Apiary.io wants to make developing and implementing APIs a quicker process. Apiary.io site says they will also help you describe, test, manage and share your API with developers.
I feel that API deployment services is a huge opportunity in this space, its good to see a provider step up that will help API owners deploy their APIs, as well as manage them.
Apiary.iois still in private Beta, so I can't take it for a spin yet. It will be interesting to learn more about what this latest API service provider can bring to the table.
